name: Danilo Gallinari
comment: Gallinari (knee) said Sunday in an interview with Gianluca Bortolomai of AroundTheGame.com that his goal remains to return to game action at some point during the Celtics' postseason run.

name: Marcus Smart
comment: Smart (ankle) said he hopes to return in one-to-two weeks, Souichi Terada of The Springfield Republican reports.

name: Seth Curry
comment: Curry (knee) has been ruled out for Thursday's game against the Pistons.

name: Day'Ron Sharpe
comment: Sharpe (back) has been ruled out for Wednesday's game against the Pistons, Kristian Winfield of the New York Daily News reports.

name: Kevin Durant
comment: Durant (knee) is on track with his recovery plan and will be re-evaluated again in two weeks, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Cody Martin
comment: Martin (knee) has been ruled out for Thursday's game against the Bulls.

name: Kelly Oubre Jr.
comment: Oubre will undergo surgery on a torn ligament in his left hand and will be sidelined for 4-to-6 weeks, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Goran Dragic
comment: Dragic (illness), who is out for Thursday's game against the Hornets, has gotten in several workouts and will meet the team in Orlando ahead of Saturday's game against the Magic, Julia Poe of the Chicago Tribune reports.

name: Javonte Green
comment: Green (knee) is at least a week away from workouts that include running and jumping, Julia Poe of the Chicago Tribune reports. He remains without a timetable for a return.

name: Lonzo Ball
comment: Ball said Monday that he's still experiencing some discomfort in his surgically repaired left knee and acknowledged the possibility that he might not be able to play during the 2022-23 season, K.C. Johnson of NBC Sports Chicago reports.

name: Donovan Mitchell
comment: Mitchell (groin) will not take the floor for Thursday's meeting with the Rockets, Chris Fedor of The Cleveland Plain Dealer reports.

name: Kevin Love
comment: Love (back spasms) won't play Thursday against the Rockets, Chris Fedor of The Cleveland Plain Dealer reports.

name: Dylan Windler
comment: Head coach J.B. Bickerstaff said Monday that Windler (ankle) is making progress and expected to play at some point this season, but the forward remains out indefinitely, Evan Dammarell of FearTheSword.com reports.

name: Maxi Kleber
comment: Kleber said Wednesday that he hopes to return from a torn right hamstring prior to the All-Star break, Tim MacMahon of ESPN.com reports.

name: Jack White
comment: White sat out Wednesday's 107-99 loss to the Bucks with a left adductor strain.

name: Collin Gillespie
comment: Gillespie (leg) has been ruled out for Wednesday's matchup against the Bucks.

name: Michael Porter Jr.
comment: Porter (personal) will not take the floor Wednesday versus the Bucks, Mike Singer of The Denver Post reports.

name: Cory Joseph
comment: Joseph has been ruled out for Thursday's matchup against Brooklyn due to low back soreness, Mike Curtis of The Detroit News reports.

name: Marvin Bagley III
comment: Bagley underwent surgery to repair a fracture of the third and fourth metacarpals in his right hand Thursday and will be re-evaluated in six weeks, NBA writer Marc Stein reports.

name: Cade Cunningham
comment: Cunningham (lower leg) underwent successful surgery Friday to stabilize and promote healing of his left tibial stress fracture, James L. Edwards III of The Athletic reports.

name: Andrew Wiggins
comment: Wiggins (illness) is considered questionable for Friday's game versus the Raptors.

name: Andre Iguodala
comment: Iguodala (hip) is out Wednesday against the Grizzlies.

name: Eric Gordon
comment: Gordon has been ruled out for Thursday's game against Cleveland due to right knee soreness.

name: Jae'Sean Tate
comment: Tate is out Thursday against the Cavaliers due to right ankle injury management.

name: Kevin Porter Jr.
comment: Porter (foot) will not play in Saturday's game against the Timberwolves and will be re-evaluated in one week, Jonathan Feigen of the Houston Chronicle reports.

name: Daniel Theis
comment: Theis (knee) is out for Friday's game against the Bucks.

name: Andrew Nembhard
comment: Nembhard (illness) is questionable for Friday's game against the Bucks.

name: Tyrese Haliburton
comment: Head coach Rick Carlisle said Haliburton (knee) participated in the non-contact parts of Monday's practice, Tony East of SI.com reports.

name: Marcus Morris Sr.
comment: Morris (rib) has been ruled out for Thursday's game against San Antonio, Tomer Azarly of ClutchPoints.com reports.

name: John Wall
comment: Clippers head coach Tyronn Lue said Sunday that Wall has been diagnosed with an abdominal strain and will be re-evaluated in two weeks, Law Murray of The Athletic reports.

name: Lonnie Walker IV
comment: Walker (knee) will not play in Wednesday's game against San Antonio, Dan Woike of the Los Angeles Times reports.

name: Austin Reaves
comment: Reaves (hamstring) went through a full-speed non-contact workout Tuesday and is expected to undergo strength testing Wednesday, Dan Woike of the Los Angeles Times reports.

name: John Konchar
comment: Konchar (concussion) remains out for Friday's matchup against the Timberwolves.

name: Danny Green
comment: The Grizzlies assigned Green (knee) to the G League's Memphis Hustle on Wednesday.

name: Steven Adams
comment: Adams has been diagnosed with a PCL sprain in his right knee and is expected to miss the next 3-to-5 weeks.

name: Max Strus
comment: Strus is probable for Friday's game against the Magic due to shoulder irritation, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Caleb Martin
comment: Martin (quadriceps) is probable for Friday's game against the Magic, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Duncan Robinson
comment: Robinson will undergo finger surgery and be out for four weeks, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Nikola Jovic
comment: Jovic (back) will miss another four weeks, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Omer Yurtseven
comment: Yurtseven underwent successful surgery Tuesday to address an impingement, bone spur and stress reaction in his left ankle and is out indefinitely.

name: MarJon Beauchamp
comment: Beauchamp (knee) is questionable Friday against the Pacers.

name: Giannis Antetokounmpo
comment: Antetokounmpo is probable for Friday's game against the Pacers due to right knee soreness.

name: Bobby Portis
comment: Portis (knee) is expected to miss at least two weeks, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.

name: Serge Ibaka
comment: Ibaka (personal) and the Bucks mutually agreed Friday to begin pursuing trade opportunities, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Rudy Gobert
comment: Gobert (groin) is questionable for Friday's matchup against the Grizzlies.

name: Taurean Prince
comment: Prince (ankle) remains out for Friday's game versus the Grizzlies.

name: Karl-Anthony Towns
comment: Timberwolves head coach Chris Finch said Saturday that Towns (calf) has "no timetable" to return to game action, Dane Moore of 'The Dane Moore NBA Podcast' reports.

name: Jordan McLaughlin
comment: Timberwolves head coach Chris Finch said Monday that he doesn't expect McLaughlin (calf) to return to game action anytime soon, Dane Moore of 'The Dane Moore NBA Podcast' reports.

name: Dyson Daniels
comment: Coach Willie Green noted that Daniels (ankle) will be "out for a little bit of time," Erin Summers of Bally Sports New Orleans reports.

name: Zion Williamson
comment: Williamson (hamstring) will be re-evaluated in two weeks.

name: E.J. Liddell
comment: Liddell (knee) signed a two-way contract with the Pelicans on Sunday.

name: Mitchell Robinson
comment: Robinson (thumb) underwent surgery Thursday to repair his broken right thumb and will be re-evaluated in three weeks.

name: Jeremiah Robinson-Earl
comment: Robinson-Earl (ankle) is out Sunday against the Nuggets.

name: Aleksej Pokusevski
comment: Pokusevski sustained a non-displaced tibial plateau fracture in his left leg Tuesday's game against the Thunder and will be re-evaluated in six to eight weeks, Nick Crain of Forbes.com reports.

name: Chet Holmgren
comment: Holmgren (foot) underwent a successful secondary procedure Tuesday to remove hardware from his initial Lisfranc surgery in August, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Kevon Harris
comment: Harris (face) was sent to the G League's Lakeland Magic on Thursday.

name: Chuma Okeke
comment: Okeke (knee) will remain out for Monday's game against the Celtics, Khobi Price of the Orlando Sentinel reports.

name: Landry Shamet
comment: Shamet (foot) has been ruled out for Thursday's matchup against Dallas, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Devin Booker
comment: The Suns announced Wednesday that Booker (groin) will be re-evaluated in a week, Gerald Bourguet of GoPHNX.com reports.

name: Cameron Payne
comment: Payne (foot) will be re-evaluated in one week, Gerald Bourguet of GoPHNX.com reports.

name: Jae Crowder
comment: Crowder, who has been away from the Suns all season while the team explores avenues to trade him, has been working out daily in Atlanta in order to stay ready for his next opportunity to play, Chris Haynes of BleacherReport.com reports.

name: Justise Winslow
comment: WInslow (ankle) is showing significant improvement but is expected to miss at least the next two weeks.

name: Josh Richardson
comment: Richardson (knee) won't play Thursday against the Clippers, Paul Garcia of ProjectSpurs.com reports.

name: Jeremy Sochan
comment: Sochan (quad) will not play in Thursday's game against the Clippers, Paul Garcia of ProjectSpurs.com reports.

name: Romeo Langford
comment: Langford (hip) is out for Thursday's game against the Clippers.

name: Devin Vassell
comment: Vassell (knee) was spotted Tuesday doing some walking on a treadmill, Tom Osborn of the San Antonio Express-News reports.

name: Dalano Banton
comment: Banton (hip) is questionable for Friday's game against the Warriors.

name: Otto Porter Jr.
comment: The Raptors announced Tuesday that Porter underwent season-ending surgery on his left foot, Marc J. Spears of ESPN.com reports.

name: Kelly Olynyk
comment: Olynyk (ankle) has begun on-court work but will likely miss another week, Andy Larsen of The Salt Lake Tribune reports.

name: Kristaps Porzingis
comment: The Wizards have optimism that Porzingis could be ready to return to the lineup within two weeks while he recovers from the left ankle sprain he suffered in Saturday's 138-118 win over the Magic, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.
